silencemobs-fabric.duskconfig.title: Silence Mobs Config
silencemobs-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_onlyA: If enabled, only allows the /silencestick command with cheats enabled.
silencemobs-fabric.duskconfig.onlyAllowC: Only Allow Command When Cheats Enabled
silencemobs-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_mustH: If disabled, a stick will be generated via the /silencestick command instead of having to hold a stick while using the command.
silencemobs-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_renam: If enabled, whenever a player hits a non-silenced mob with The Silence Stick it will set their name to 'Silenced Entity'.
